pages.title: Blood Shard
pages.text: They allow anyone possessing even a single one to create new rune stones on the Dark Altar. $(p)The legends say that within those pale red crystal are trapped the souls of hundreds is not thousands of humans, condensed to nothing more than a conscious energy.
Only the most despicable of the mad ever even conceived the vague idea of creating them, and now their temples lay overtaken by the evil forces they summoned, among the wastelands of the Nether.
